channel.title: Can someone help me make freezing ancients
channel.description: can someone help me make ancients freeze please... it would be much apreciated. freeze npc too - foolio

item.title: Can someone help me make freezing ancients
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

well dude, they arent gonna move, because you dont have a walking range for the npcs!!@@!@!@# you have to have a walking range, they will NEVER move. even when they ARENT frozeded

ENJOYZZ[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 20, 2007, 11:21:37 PM[/size][hr]well dude, when i was looking through my client i found ANOTHER code for ice barrages, so just add this UNDER the one i just gave you…here…

if(magicID == 12891) {// Ice Barrage if (playerLevel[playerMagic] >= 94) { stillgfx(369, EnemyY2, EnemyX2); stillgfx(368, absY, absX); hitDiff = 0 + misc.random(45); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; addSkillXP((100000*hitDiff), playerMagic); setAnimation(709); server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].Frozentimer = 60; } else { sendMessage("You do not have the right level to cast this spell."); } }

THE FIRST ONE WAS FOR PLAYERS, THIS ONE IS FOR NPCS!

Read full topic

item.title: Can someone help me make freezing ancients
item.dc:creator: @Darque_Star Darque Star
item.description:
@Darque_Star wrote:

OMG ur like the 851th person i answered this to…heres the magic id code!

if(spellID == 12891) // ice barrage (lvl 94 spell) { if(playerLevel[6] >= 94) { hitDiff = misc.random(35); startAnimation(1979); attackPlayersWithin(369, 40, 5); castOnPlayer.inCombat(); inCombat(); PkingDelay = 15; stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.stillgfx(369, castOnPlayer.absY, castOnPlayer.absX); castOnPlayer.sendMessage("You have been frozen!"); sendMessage("You freeze the enemy!"); teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; } else if(playerLevel[6] <= 93) { sendMessage("You need a magic level of 94 to cast this spell."); } }

Read full topic
